cheatsheet.title: Connect to the embedded AUT Agent

intro.description: These steps guide you in connecting to the embedded AUT Agent.

item.title: Connecting to the embedded AUT Agent
item.description: Connect to the embedded AUT Agent using the toolbar button. Select Connect to embedded AUT Agent from the drop-down list.

item.title: Change the port number in the preferences if necessary
item.description:
The standard port for the embedded AUT Agent is 60000. If this is already in use, change the port number via: Window/Preferences.
The setting is found under the Test/AUT Agent/Embedded AUT Agent section.
